fields.name: Response Due Date
fields.description: The latest date by which the additional information is to be returned to requestor.

fields.name: Patient Consent
fields.dataTypeName: Coded Value For Hl7 Defined Tables
fields.description: Code indicating if the Payer has obtained patient consent for release of information (1) – Optional.  Refer to HL7 Table 0136 – Yes/No Indicator for suggested values.

fields.name: Date Additional Information Was Submitted
fields.description: The date on which the information was assembled for transmission to the Payer.  Not necessarily the same as the message date.
